project.description:
Build Perl for Windows
Downloads: http://www.cpan.org/src/README.html

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PKG_VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The version of Perl to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PKG_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the download tarball and source directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "==== Updating 'jenkins-config.git' repo ====" cd $JENKINS_HOME/src/jenkins-config.git git pull echo "==== Updating 'camelbox.git' repo ====" cd $JENKINS_HOME/src/camelbox.git git pull

echo "==== Downloading Perl ${PKG_VERSION} ====" if [ ! -f ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz ]; then wget -O ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz \ http://www.cpan.org/src/5.0/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz else echo "-- Perl ${PKG_VERSION} already downloaded --" fi
exit 0

# always unpack fresh source echo "==== Checking for existing Perl ${PKG_VERSION} ====" if [ -d "${WORKSPACE}\\${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}" ]; then echo "-- Deleting existing source tree for '${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}'; --" /bin/rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} else echo "-- No Perl tarball currently unpacked in ${WORKSPACE} --" fi

#echo "==== Resetting PATH environment variable ====" #export PATH=".:/mingw/bin:/bin:/usr/bin" #echo "PATH is now: $PATH" echo "==== Gunzipping Perl ${PKG_VERSION} in ${WORKSPACE} ====" /bin/gunzip -c ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz | /bin/tar -xf -
#echo "==== Changing permissions of files in ${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}/pod ====" #/bin/find.exe ${WORKSPACE}\\${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}\\pod -type f -exec chmod o+w '{}' \;

echo "==== Copying makefile.mk to ${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}\\win32 ====" if [ -d ${WORKSPACE}\\${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} ]; then cd ${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}\\win32 mv makefile.mk makefile.mk.orig #MAKEFILE_LOC="$JENKINS_HOME/src/camelbox.git/build-extras/next_build/${PKG_VERSION}/win32/makefile.mk" MAKEFILE_LOC="/c/Apps/Jenkins/src/camelbox.git/build-extras/next_build/perl-5.18.2/win32/makefile.mk" cp $MAKEFILE_LOC $PWD else echo "==== ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} not found :( ====" fi
